title: [其它]MineReset——重新设置矿物和生成率[1.8+]
author: HP9999
txt_content:
本帖最后由 HP9999 于 2019-10-2 08:56 编辑 
这是第二次搬运站内原来的帖子原贴有部分是参考原大佬的资料~原搬的授权~
还会更的 我需要去试试
已经原作者授权~
MineReset矿物重设
你试过过资源世界放核弹到处挖，最后一箱子工业矿没有虚无的悲哀嘛？
不管你信不信，反正我是哭了这个插件可以帮助你设置这些
插件の优点
支持多个世界
支持模组的矿物
支持智能填充，防止玩家在重置时被卡住
支持按百分比随机生成矿物
游戏设置简单
支持定时重置
一键删除矿物（有什么用嘛）
可以配置消息
...

指令

没翻译就是没用过x
下面有快速配置
Help 命令
权限 : minereset.help (Required for all other 命令s)
指令: /mine help
用途: 这还用说？？

Time 命令
权限: minereset.check.time
指令: /mine time [mine]
用途: 查看重置的剩余时间

List 命令
权限: minereset.list
指令: /mine list [组|矿区|spawn]
用途: 列出全部的组/矿区/传送点

Details 命令
权限: minereset.details
指令: /mine info [组|矿区|spawn] [name]
用途: 得到组/矿区/传送点的详细信息

General Admin 命令（以下不建议给予玩家）
Reload 命令
权限: minereset.reload
指令: /mine reload
用途: 重载配置文件

Save 命令
权限: minereset.save
指令: /mine save
用途: 保存矿区的信息到配置文件

Clear 命令
权限: minereset.clear
指令: /mine clear [mine]
用途: 删除某个矿区全部的方块

Fill 命令
权限: minereset.fill
指令: /mine fill [mine]
用途: 用你设置的参数填上这个矿区

FillBlock 命令
权限: minereset.fillblock
指令: /mine fillblock [mine]
用途: 用你脚下的方块填满这个矿区

Setup 命令s
Added AddSpawn 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.4)
权限: minereset.addspawn
指令: /mine addspawn [x] [y] [z] [facing]
用途: 添加一个传送点

Added RemoveSpawn 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.4)
权限: minereset.removespawn
指令: /mine removespawn [spawn point]
用途: 删除一个传送点

Added UpdateSpawn 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.4)
权限: minereset.updatespawn
指令: /mine updatespawn [spawn point] [x] [y] [z] [facing]
用途: Updates the spawn information to the listed values (To alter default spawn use "Default" other wise use the number of spawn)不会 下一个

Added ChangeSpawn 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.4)
权限: minereset.changespawn
指令: /mine changespawn [mine] [spawn point]
用途: 改变一个矿区的传送点

SetSpawn 命令 :no_entry_sign: (Removed in 1.0.4)
权限: minereset.setspawn
指令: /mine setspawn [x] [y] [z] [north|south|east|west]
用途: 用来设置传送到矿区的传送点

DefineGroup 命令
权限: minereset.define.group
指令: /mine definegroup [group name] [reset time] [initial delay]
用途: 创建一个新的组

UpdateGroup 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.3)
权限: minereset.update.group
指令: /mine updategroup [group name] [reset time] [initial delay]
用途: 好像是用来备份的？下面有实例~

DeleteGroup 命令
权限: minereset.delete.group
指令: /mine deletegroup [group name] [safe|force]
用途: 删除一个组

DefineMine 命令
权限: minereset.define.mine
指令: /mine definemine [组名] [矿区名] [pos1x] [pos1y] [pos1z] [pos2x] [pos2y] [pos2z]
用途: 创建一个新的矿区

RedefineMine 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.2)
权限: minereset.redefine.mine
指令: /mine redefinemine [group] [mine name] [pos1x] [pos1y] [pos1z] [pos2x] [pos2y] [pos2z]
用途: Redefine a mine to change its settings to listed group with name and positions as listed没用过x不翻译

DeleteMine 命令
权限: minereset.delete.mine
指令: /mine deletemine [mine name]
用途: 删除一个矿区

AddOre 命令
权限: minereset.mine.addore
指令: /mine addore [矿区] [百分比]
用途: 添加你脚下的方块到矿物列表里面

UpdateOre 命令
权限: minereset.mine.updateore
指令: /mine updateore [mine] [percentage]
用途: Updates the block you are standing on in listed mine to listed percentage (percentage of 0 will remove the block from the mine)

ListReminders 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.2)
权限: minereset.mine.listremindtime
指令: /mine listreminders
用途: List the times before a mine reset reminder messages are sent

AddRemindTime 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.2)
权限: minereset.mine.addremindtime
指令: /mine addremindtime [seconds]
用途:增加一个矿区的重置时间

RemoveRemindTime 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.2)
权限: minereset.mine.removeremindtime
指令: /mine removeremindtime [seconds]
用途: 减少一个矿区的重置时间

SetupSmartFill 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.3)
权限: minereset.mine.setup.smartfill
指令: /mine setupsmartfill [mine] [true|false(enabled)] [radius] [true|false(only air)]
用途: 更改智能填充的模式

AddAirBlock 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.3)
权限: minereset.mine.addairblock
指令: /mine addairblock
用途: Adds the block the player is standing on to the list of blocks that will not be modified when using SmartFill and SmartFillOnlyAir settings

RemoveAirBlock 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.3)
权限: minereset.mine.removeairblock
指令: /mine removeairblock
用途: Removes the block the player is standing on to the list of blocks that will not be modified when using SmartFill and SmartFillOnlyAir settings

UpdateChatSettings 命令 :new: (Added in 1.0.4)
权限: minereset.update.chatsettings
指令: /mine updatechatsettings [FillingText|ReminderText] [setting]
用途: 更改重置矿区时的提示信息
配置文件都可以在游戏内配置没有再贴出

快速配置
1
指令: /mine updatespawn Default 0.5 64 0.5 north  :new: (1.0.4+)
指令: /mine setspawn 0.5 64 0.5 north  :no_entry_sign: (1.0.4前)
这步的意思好像是设置传送点？
（大概 我还没有去实践一下）
2
创建一个名为“示例”的新组，
该组每隔30分钟（1800秒）重置一次，
时钟在服务器启动后10分钟（600秒）启动。
此组中的所有矿区雷将在服务器启动后40分钟重置，
然后每隔30分钟重置一次。
指令： /mine definegroup example 1800 600
3
创建一个名为“first”的新矿区，
在“example”组中，
设置为坐标0 64 0和10 50 10之间的长方体中
命令：/mine definemine example first 0 64 0 10 50 10
4
在我们新的矿区里加一个20%的“第一”矿。
直接站在所选块的顶部，运行命令。
（一定是站在顶部 它会自动识别）
命令：/mine addore first 20


汉化文件看着难受也没办法复制进去是对的
剩下的好像并不重要过一段再填填完发文件"1 - General" {
    mineFillTimeTaken="%mine%花费了%totalTime% 毫秒（异步任务%asyncTime%毫秒和同步任务%syncTime%毫秒）。数量: %volume%. 改变的方块: %changedBlocks%"
    minePrefix="&9&l[矿物重置]&r &e"
    noPlayerOnline="矿物重置没有检测到在线玩家"
}
"2 - Command Messages" {
    addSpawnPoint="你添加了一个新的面向%facing% 名为%spawnName%的传送点在这个WorldUUID:%worldUUIDString%世界的在X:%x% Y:%y% Z:%z%"
    addedOre="你添加了%block%以%percentage%%在矿区%mine%"
    airBlockAdd="You have added %block% to the list of blocks that will not be modified when using SmartFill and SmartFillOnlyAir settings"
    airBlockExist="That time is already on the list of times to send a reset reminder so was not added"
    airBlockNotExist="That block is not on the list of blocks that will not be modified when using SmartFill and SmartFillOnlyAir settings"
    airBlockRemove="You have removed %block% from the list of blocks that will not be modified when using SmartFill and SmartFillOnlyAir settings"
    changedFallback="You have changed the fallback block to: %block%"
    chatSettingAlreadySet="The chat settings for %type% is already %option%"
    chatSettingChanged="You have successfully changed the chat setting for %type% to %option%"
    configReloaded="配置文件已重载"
    configSaved="The config file has been saved"
    definedNewMine="您定义了一个新的名为%mine%的矿区"
    definedNewMineGroup="您定义了一个新的名为%group%的矿区组"
    delayTooShort="你的延迟不能为设置小于0"
    deleteGroupFailContents="%group%不能被删除。因为它包含内容，而此命令不是强制执行的"
    deletedMine="你已经删除了%mine%矿区。"
    invalidChatSetting="您设置的消息提示无效。请参阅文档"
    invalidChatType="这不是一个值的类型。用(FillingText|ReminderText)"
    maxSpawnCount="您已经达到了设置传送点的最大数量"
    mineAlreadyExists="已经有一个名为%mine%的矿区存在"
    mineCleared="%mine%矿区的方块已经清除"
    mineDoesNotExist="%mine%矿区不存在"
    mineFillSignPercentageInvalid="这个值不被允许。请输入0到100内的数字"
    mineFillSignPercentageUpdated="你已经更改了矿物的生成率为%percentage%%"
    mineFilledBlock="%mine%矿区已经用%block%填充了"
    mineGroupAlreadyExists="已经有一个名为%group%的矿区组存在"
    mineGroupDeleted="%group%已经被删除"
    mineGroupDoesNotExist="%group%不是一个矿区组"
    mineSpawnChanged="%mine%矿区的传送点已更改为%spawnValue%"
    noDirectionToSpawn="方向输入不正确，已默认设置为北"
    noMineGroups="没有矿区组"
    noMines="没有矿区"
    noRemoveDefaultSpawn="你不能移除初始的传送点"
    oreAlreadyInMine="%block%已在列出的矿区中，因此未添加。可以使用“/mine updateore”命令更改块的百分比。"
    oreNotInMine="%block%不在当前的矿区中，因此无法编辑"
    orePercentageError="The percentage you have listed would increase the mine beyond 100%"
    oreRemoved="%block% has been removed as you entered 0%"
    oreSamePercentageError="No changes were made because the new percentage is the same as the old percentage for %block% in %mine%"
    percentageTooSmall="The percentage value you entered is too small. Percentage must be greater than 0"
    percentageTooSmallUpdate="The percentage value you entered is too small. Percentage must be greater than 0. A value of 0 will remove the ore from the mine"
    playerOnlyCommand="This command must be run by a player"
    redefinedMine="You have redefined the mine to the defined information for mine: %mine%"
    remindList="list of seconds before mine reset a reminder message is issued: %list%"
    remindTimeAdd="You have added %time% (%readableTime%) to the list of times a message will be sent before a mine reset reminding of a mine reset"
    remindTimeExist="That time is already on the list of times to send a reset reminder so was not added"
    remindTimeNotExist="该时间不在规定的时间范围内，因此未被删除。"
    remindTimeRemove="你移除了%time% (%readableTime%)重置时间，将会发送一条消息提醒重置。"
    removeSpawnPoint="You have removed spawn point: Spawn%spawnValue%"
    resetTime="%mine% will reset in: %time%"
    resetTimeTooShort="Your reset time for a new group must be 1 minute or more"
    sameFallback="No changes were made because this is already the fallback block"
    settingSetMessageOptIn="You have successfully changed your message settings to receive mine fill and remind messages"
    settingSetMessageOptOut="You have successfully changed your message settings to block mine fill and remind messages"
    spawnPointAlreadyInUse="%mine% already uses that spawn point"
    spawnPointNotExist="The listed spawn point does not exist"
    unableToAddFallback="%block% is the default block so you cannot add it to the mine again. It is used to top the mine up to 100% full after all the other ores are taken into account"
    unableToEditFallback="%block% is the default block so you cannot edit its percentage or remove it. It is used to top the mine up to 100% full after all the other ores are taken into account"
    updateMineGroup="You have updated the mine group with the name: %group%"
    updatedDisplayName="You have updated the display name for %mine% from %old% to %new%"
    updatedSpawnPoint="You have updated the spawn point to X:%x% Y:%y% Z:%z% Facing:%facing% WorldUUID:%worldUUIDString%"
}复制代码

replies.author: chrillsims3
replies.txt_content:
使用以后摸索出来一些技巧做一些简要简要教程
/mine updatespawn Default x y z north  这条指令是设置如果玩家在矿区范围内，矿区生成矿物事会将玩家传送到的坐标和朝向！
简单的配置一个矿区
1.新建一个矿区组/mine definegroup 矿区组名 矿物重置时间 启动服务器后生成矿物时间 （单位为秒）
2.在矿区组内添加一个矿区并设置两个坐标间的范围/mine definemine 矿区组 矿区 x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2 
3.添加矿物/mine addore 矿区 矿物占比 这一步最重要 要站在你所要添加进矿区的方块上来输入此指令 注意必须站在方块上 否则会识别为空，还有插件的配置文件一定要用原版，汉化后贴进去的多多少少会出现矿区不出现方块的BUG。
4.如果后期要修改矿物分配的可配置文件修改。。

replies.author: yahinstudio
replies.txt_content: 好插件，支持一下~
